segments.text: Can you suggest a few exercise to help me get fit and stretch my muscles a little ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . If you want to stretch your legs , a good exercise is to lift your knee in front of your body , like this . It ’ s a very simple exercise , but very effective .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to excise my arms too . How can I do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One good way is to do push-ups . Another way is to use weights . Make sure you grip the weights firmly . You don ’ t want to drop them on your feet !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I do push-ups , should I bend my elbows so that my nose touches the ground ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s a good exercise for my chest muscles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One that I recommend is that you lie on your back . You should have a weight in each hand and stretch your arms out side of your body .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I need plenty of space for this exercise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you do . Lift the weight up , keeping your arms straight all the time .
segments.speaker: S2
